attributes.action: allow smoking in pubs and clubs which do not serve food.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a landlord; since the introduction of the smoking ban I have experienced a reduction in business in excess of 25%!!! My staff smoke and have no problem with working in a smoking workplace. I am having to lay off staff or reduce their hours therefore reducing the tax revenue to the government both by income tax and duty on alcohol!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
